entry.title: [BIP 15] Aliases
entry.summary: The author of this context has shared a pre-draft that is available on the Bitcoin wiki for BIP 0015. This pre-draft serves as a starting point for discussions around the topic. The article discusses aliases, which are essentially a way to lookup bitcoin addresses using a more user-friendly name. Instead of having to remember a long string of characters, users can simply type in an alias such as genjix at genjix.net. The use of aliases makes it easier and more convenient for users to access their bitcoin addresses.
